method.name: RegisterComponent
method.tp:docstring: Registers a component with ImageLoader. ImageLoader will verify the integrity and Google signature of the component and, if and only if valid, copy the component into its internal storage.

arg.name: name
arg.tp:docstring: The name of the component.

arg.name: version
arg.tp:docstring: The version of the component.

arg.name: component_folder_abs_path
arg.tp:docstring: The absolute path to the current component folder that ImageLoader will verify and copy the component from.

arg.name: success
arg.tp:docstring: The result of the component registration (success or failure).

method.name: GetComponentVersion
method.tp:docstring: Returns the currently registered version of the given component.

arg.name: name
arg.tp:docstring: The name of the component.

arg.name: version
arg.tp:docstring: The returned version of the component.

method.name: LoadComponent
method.tp:docstring: Loads the component, if and only if the component verifies the signature check, and returns the mount point.

arg.name: name
arg.tp:docstring: The name of the component.

arg.name: mount_point
arg.tp:docstring: The mount point of the verified and mounted component.

method.name: LoadComponentAtPath
method.tp:docstring: Loads the component at the given path, if and only if the component verifies the signature check, and returns the mount point.

arg.name: name
arg.tp:docstring: The name of the component.

arg.name: absolute_path
arg.tp:docstring: The absolute path where the component is located.

arg.name: mount_point
arg.tp:docstring: The mount point of the verified and mounted component.

arg.name: id
arg.tp:docstring: The ID of the DLC module.

arg.name: package
arg.tp:docstring: The package ID of the DLC module.

arg.name: a_or_b
arg.tp:docstring: Whether to load image A or image B ({"Dlc-A", "Dlc-B"}). Each DLC module has two images (A and B) which corresponds to the two rootfs partitions (Root-A and Root-B). e.g. If current active roofs partition is Root-A, then "Dlc-A" should be passed in.

arg.name: mount_point
arg.tp:docstring: The mount point of the verified and mounted image. When successful, |mount_point| is "/run/imageloader/|id|". Otherwise it is empty.

arg.name: load_request
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (LoadDlcRequest, platform2/system_api/dbus/imageloader/imageloader.proto) of arguments that determine now a DLC gets verified and mounted.

arg.name: mount_point
arg.tp:docstring: The mount point of the verified and mounted image. When successful, |mount_point| is "/run/imageloader/|DLC_ID|". Otherwise it is empty.

method.name: RemoveComponent
method.tp:docstring: Remove all versions of a component if removable.

arg.name: name
arg.tp:docstring: The name of the component.

arg.name: success
arg.tp:docstring: The result of the component removal (success or failure).

method.name: GetComponentMetadata
method.tp:docstring: Get the metadata for a registered component.

arg.name: name
arg.tp:docstring: The name of the component.

arg.name: metadata
arg.tp:docstring: The metadata associated with this component.

method.name: UnmountComponent
method.tp:docstring: Unmount all mount points of a component.

arg.name: name
arg.tp:docstring: The name of the component.

arg.name: success
arg.tp:docstring: The result of the component unmount (success or failure).

arg.name: id
arg.tp:docstring: ID of the DLC.

arg.name: package
arg.tp:docstring: Package ID of the DLC.

arg.name: success
arg.tp:docstring: The result of the Dlc unmount (success or failure).
